attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a knighthood so he will be Sir at least or Lord he deserves it
attributes.background: Nigel has done a lot for us having the insults etc thrown at him, and came through it, and the only one that stood up for all of us, and the only one that told the truth correcting the MP's lies, and took it in his stride. He should be in number 10 right now.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
